argumentText:
ARGUMENT
n r

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | matval.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 2 |  | matval.g | |- G = ( R freeLMod ( N X. N ) ) |
| 3 |  | matval.t | |- .x. = ( R maMul <. N , N , N >. ) |
| 4 |  | #P_elex | |- ( R e. V -> R e. _V ) |
| 5 |  | #P_id | |- ( r = R -> r = R ) |
| 6 |  | #P_id | |- ( n = N -> n = N ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_sqxpeqd | |- ( n = N -> ( n X. n ) = ( N X. N ) ) |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_oveqan12rd | |- ( ( n = N /\ r = R ) -> ( r freeLMod ( n X. n ) ) = ( R freeLMod ( N X. N ) ) ) |
| 9 | 8, 2 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( ( n = N /\ r = R ) -> ( r freeLMod ( n X. n ) ) = G ) |
| 10 | 6, 6, 6 | #P_oteq123d | |- ( n = N -> <. n , n , n >. = <. N , N , N >. ) |
| 11 | 5, 10 | #P_oveqan12rd | |- ( ( n = N /\ r = R ) -> ( r maMul <. n , n , n >. ) = ( R maMul <. N , N , N >. ) ) |
| 12 | 11, 3 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( ( n = N /\ r = R ) -> ( r maMul <. n , n , n >. ) = .x. ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_opeq2d | |- ( ( n = N /\ r = R ) -> <. ( .r ` ndx ) , ( r maMul <. n , n , n >. ) >. = <. ( .r ` ndx ) , .x. >. ) |
| 14 | 9, 13 | #P_oveq12d | |- ( ( n = N /\ r = R ) -> ( ( r freeLMod ( n X. n ) ) sSet <. ( .r ` ndx ) , ( r maMul <. n , n , n >. ) >. ) = ( G sSet <. ( .r ` ndx ) , .x. >. ) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_df-mat | |- Mat = ( n e. Fin , r e. _V |-> ( ( r freeLMod ( n X. n ) ) sSet <. ( .r ` ndx ) , ( r maMul <. n , n , n >. ) >. ) ) |
| 16 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( G sSet <. ( .r ` ndx ) , .x. >. ) e. _V |
| 17 | 14, 15, 16 | #P_ovmpt2a | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. _V ) -> ( N Mat R ) = ( G sSet <. ( .r ` ndx ) , .x. >. ) ) |
| 18 | 4, 17 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. V ) -> ( N Mat R ) = ( G sSet <. ( .r ` ndx ) , .x. >. ) ) |
| 19 | 1, 18 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. V ) -> A = ( G sSet <. ( .r ` ndx ) , .x. >. ) ) |
